column2: print(ggplot(XistAdjacent, aes(x=reorder(Names,SexViralNumeric),y= Expression,fill=SexViralNumeric)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", colour="black") +theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.75,hjust = 0.75, size=8)) +  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(n.dodge = 2))+ coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,500))+ xlab("Adjacent Samples Expression data") + labs(title="XIST Tumor Adjacent Samples Expression Data"))
